channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:51 Close the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:51 Close the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
